July 16, 2024 - Leifheit AG is a German manufacturing company that makes household products. It was founded in 1959 by Günter Leifheit (13 December 1920 – 2 July 2009) with his wife Ingeborg, as Günter Leifheit KG. He sold the company in 1973. In 2006 he received the Order of Merit of Rhineland-Palatinate.

The Leifheit Group Brand Business distributes products under the well-known brands Leifheit and Soehnle. These brand products are characterised by high-quality workmanship and high degree of consumer benefits.
